txt.en: Dargnákh Unleashed -- Tier 1
Dargnákh has been driven to rampage!
You drove Dargnákh from the outbuildings!
You defeated Huva!
Use the ballistae to goad Dargnákh into a rampage.
Dargnákh has escaped to continue his rampage!
Drive Dargnákh from the outbuildings by setting him aflame with the torches on the walls.
You defeated Dargnákh!
Defeat Huva, an acolyte of Saruman.
The room shudders with Dargnákh's anger!
Use food to lure Dargnákh to escape and continue his rampage.
A ceiling brace has collapsed!
Defeat Dargnákh the troll before he escapes into the wild.
Use the ballistae to goad Dargnákh into a rampage
Use the torches to set the Orc's powder alight and drive Dargnákh from the outbuildings
Defeat Huva
Use food to lure Dargnákh to escape and continue his rampage
Defeat Dargnákh
Defeated Dargnákh
You have come upon the cage of Dargnákh, the troll captured by the servants of the White Hand. Perhaps this may be used to your advantage as you seek to disrupt Saruman's war-efforts.
Use the Ballistae to drive Dargnákh berserk!
'Why do you hound Dargnákh? Now you die!'
'Arrgh! Dargnákh not like sun!'
'Fire burn Dargnákh! Arrgh!'
'No! Dargnákh hate sun!'
'Evil light blinds Dargnákh!  Dargnákh will crush EVERYTHING!'
'Nooo! Dargnákh cannot see! Dargnákh burns! Dargnákh must... flee...'
'Puny metal sticks not stop Dargnákh!'
